TriggerOraclev10g.name: RETREV_BUR_TRG
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
declare
lErrCode NUMBER;
lErrMsg VARCHAR2(4000);
lRec return_reversals_jn%rowtype;
begin
--
-- Journal section.
if updating('status') then
--
lRec.internal_id := :new.internal_id;
lRec.id := :new.id;
lRec.status := :new.status;
lRec.modified_by := :new.last_modified_by;
lRec.from_date := :new.last_modified_date;
--
altpayint_journal_pkg.return_reversals_jn_prc (
p_process => altpayint_journal_pkg.IS_UPDATING
,p_rec => lRec
,p_err_code => lErrCode
,p_err_msg => lErrMsg);
--
IF lErrCode <> 0 THEN
raise_application_error (-20001, 'RETREV_BUR_TRG trigger, ' || lErrMsg);
END IF;
end if;
end;
